title: [Neuroscience] Research found restoring depleted amounts of Tip60 in Alzheimer's models, not only rescues gene activation, but also partially protects against splicing disruptions -- demonstrating that the Tip60 enzyme can be a drug target to protect against two different processes that go awry in Alzheimer's
